title: Client refuses to run the actual match
body:
Logged in fine. Did champ select fine. Then this happens:

http://i.imgur.com/dKhsGhO.jpg

and it's stuck there for a while, only to be replaced by a "You have disconnected. Please try again" dialog box.

I'm very confused, as without internet I wouldn't have been able to do the first two steps....

Some help would be fantastic,
An avid Ezreal fan

replies.body:
Also Riot, I got put on lower priority queue because of this mishap. 
I would very much like to be able to reconnect, but (See problem above).

Can you please lift this penalty?
they won't lift it dude. No matter what you. If you dc then it's your problem {using riots logic here}

Right. Thanks for the heads up mate. A tad unfortunate... :(

FYI I tried the fixes on the support forums. They did shit all!

Had to re-install.
